Text:
I get this error after mounting and running the .iso

"There is an invalid character (!) in Your temp directory. Please remove the invalid character from your TEMP (or TMP) environment variable and run the installer again"

Am I the only one having this issue? I'm mounting it using Daemon Tools.
I have registered just to say thank you! It's clean (scanned with Avira and COMODO) and well served FIRST CLASS software. Thanks!
@MajorSock: Don't use DAEMON Tools Lite. It's a bunch of crap. Use this instead: http://static.slysoft.com/SetupVirtualCloneDrive.exe
what's the difference between this and the other one with 5.63 gb ?
I'm currently looking for the Unix version, anyone knows if it's already available?

I'm still getting this same error:

"There is an invalid character (!) in Your temp directory. Please remove the invalid character from your TEMP (or TMP) environment variable and run the installer again"

I tried another version as well and it just isn't working. Does anyone have any ideas? The solutions on the matlab website don't seem to be working. I can't quite tell what to look for in my environment variables.

I'm sorry, where is the .txt file for the instructions? All I see is a system info file, I read it with Notepad++, but all I saw was the same description as you posted here. If you could tell me how to set up the license files and etc. that would be great.

Sorry if this is a repost, but I couldn't find the .txt file for instructions for the license setup. I checked the file but there was only a "System Info" text which was just a copy of the description. Could anyone point me to where the instructions are?

Have been working great for a few weeks now...
Installed on Windows 7 32 bit (x86)
Scan whole file with avast: clean
Scan crack folder with virus total: clean (0/47)

Thanks to R0thschild and team CYGiSO!

PD. The crack folder is the CYGiSO folder which also contains the intructions
